title: So is Yorick not getting a skin on release?
body: Come on.... He has NEVER got a new skin... Even GP got a skin with his rework... and GP has tons.

replies.body: Im not phased, i already own undertaker  :p
He might get one, maybe they're just keeping it a secret for now

True that.

At least he might get back on the free rotation roster lol...
Ohhhhhh Thats asking a lot haha xD he isn't Yasuo or Zed remember, no special treatment for poor Yorick!
